import useInput from "../hooks/use-input"; const BasicForm = () => { const {value: formData , valueTouched: formDataTouched, valueChangeHandler : formChangeHandler, valueTouchedChangeHandler: formTouchedChangeHandler } = useInput(); const formSubmitHandler = (event) => { e console.log(formData, formDataTouched) } return
}; export default BasicForm;
